@Realjohndoe: <pre> is HTML,  not markdown.

if you want it to look like code, then you should use "```"

```
like this
```

also, you better have dynamic DNS set up before you try to install diaspora, or you won't be able to reliably federate with any other pods (and then what's the point?)

@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: hey, I still use it :(

I like to differenciate between unformatted text that is code and unformatted text that's just text. <code> and <pre> being separate tags lets me do that without CSS class fuckery.
